alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 26 at 5:14PM CDT until March 26 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL RANKIN...NORTHEASTERN HINDS AND SOUTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 513 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Jackson, moving east at 35 mph. A second severe thunderstorm was located over Flowood, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. At 448 PM, the roof was blown off the fire station in Bolton. There have been numerous reports of golf ball to 2 inch hail. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Brandon around 525 PM CDT. Fannin around 530 PM CDT. Pelahatchie around 545 PM CDT. Leesburg around 550 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
